channel.title: Alfred Hitchcock on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: The Blogger's Secret: Repetition is the very soul of the net
item.description: "Repetition the very soul of the net."  alt.config "Self-plagiarism is style."  Alfred Hitchcock. thus repeating a blog post from a while ago, which just came to mind as I was looking a postcard that someone sent to me in March after reading this list. Ten secrets to success (or, ten things that I aspire to doing regularly) <p> 1.  Send a postcard. 2.  Go for a walk. 3.
